div.div: Process of initial full model construction.
div.p: Variables included: Year (Yr), Month, hours fished (HRSF), number of fisherman (NFMEN), first and second axis of Principal Coordinate Analysis based on species abundance (PCO1 and PCO2) and presence (PCO1.2 and PCO2.2), fishing area (Area, see Fig 1), wet or dry season (Season) and weather bonefish was target or not (Target). NA resulted for models that did not converged. The final selected models where identified using a backward selection process (See S2 and S3 Tables for details) and illustrated below each table.
